name: RetinalRepairProcedures
title: Retinal Repair Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent retinal repair procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with procedures for repairing the retina, including reattachment, scleroplasty and repositioning.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

contains.display: Repair of retinal detachment with xenon arc photocoagulation (procedure)
Sclerectomy for retinal reattachment (procedure)
Lamellar resection of sclera for retinal reattachment (procedure)
Overlay scleroplasty (procedure)
Reposition plombage for detachment (procedure)
Suture of retina for reattachment (procedure)
Cerclage for retinal reattachment (procedure)
Cryopexy (procedure)
Shortening of sclera for repair of retinal detachment (procedure)
Reattachment of retina by diathermy (procedure)
Repair of retinal detachment, including drainage of subretinal fluid when performed; cryotherapy
Repair of retinal detachment, including drainage of subretinal fluid when performed; photocoagulation

Repair of retinal detachment; scleral buckling (such as lamellar scleral dissection, imbrication or encircling procedure), including, when performed, implant, cryotherapy, photocoagulation, and drainage of subretinal fluid

Repair of retinal detachment; with vitrectomy, any method, including, when performed, air or gas tamponade, focal endolaser photocoagulation, cryotherapy, drainage of subretinal fluid, scleral buckling, and/or removal of lens by same technique
Repair of retinal detachment; by injection of air or other gas (eg, pneumatic retinopexy)
Prophylaxis of retinal detachment (eg, retinal break, lattice degeneration) without drainage; cryotherapy, diathermy
Prophylaxis of retinal detachment (eg, retinal break, lattice degeneration) without drainage; photocoagulation
Reattachment of retina by electrocoagulation (procedure)
Repair of retina for retinal detachment by cryotherapy (procedure)
Repair of retina for retinal detachment by photocoagulation (procedure)
Repair of retinal detachment by laser photocoagulation (procedure)
Repair of retina for retinal detachment (procedure)
